alert.note: Alert for Kootenai (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 13 at 12:26AM MDT until June 14 at 4:09PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 AM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of North Idaho, including the following county, Kootenai. * WHEN...Until 230 AM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1126 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain. Overflowing poor drainage areas have already caused minor flooding in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Coeur d`Alene, Dalton Gardens and Fernan Lake Village. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
